tool_description:
API for US Stock Exchange. Get the live prices and all the data.

name: US Stock Prices | Live!!

api_list.name: StockPrice
api_list.description: Enter the SYMBOL/TICKER such as TSLA, AAPL etc as a parameter at the endpoint and it will give your the Live Price updates from exchange.
